text: wqal nuh -elyh alslam- baed yash min qwmh: rbb la ttrk min alkafirin bik ahdana hyana ealaa al'ard yadur wythrk. 'iinak 'iin ttrkhm dun 'ihlak yudlu eibadak aladhin qad amanuu bik ean tariq alhq, wala yat min aslabhm warhamhm 'iilaa mayl ean alhaqu shadid alkufr bik waleisyan lk. rbb aghfir li wlwaldy waliman dakhal bayti mwmnana, walilmuminin walmuminat bk, wala tazid alkafirin 'iilaa hlakana wkhsranana fi aldunya walakhrt
